title: GABARDINE COAT WITH EMBROIDERY
desc: Wool-blend gabardine coat with decorative floral Paisley embroidery on the contrasting sleeves. The inner lining features a decorative striped pattern.• Regular fit• Shirt collar• Single-breasted button closure• Side slip pockets• Rear vent• Covered buttons• Made in Italy• The model is 5’10” (178 cm) tall and wears a size 40 (IT)
